name: Polyverse (itch)
description:
STORY

Play as an orb on a journey through the polygonal universe filled with treacherous monsters and spikes. With your unique ability to switch between dimensions and power-ups scattered across the universe, how far can you go?

CONTROLS

- SPACE                        Jump (press again to double-jump while mid-air)

- CTRL                           Switch universes

- SHIFT                         Activate boost

- ESCAPE                    Pause the game

- ARROW KEYS      Navigation in menus

- ENTER                       Select in menus

Developed by Nocturnal Nightingale

Grace Chua – Producer, Procedural Generation, Lead Artist

Qi Wen – Game Designer, Particle System

Joey Foo – Technical Director, Sound Engineer, Artist

Yong Quan – Physics, Music, QA
